uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.signature

Class Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.koryphe.signature.Signature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingletonSignature, TupleSignature

    public abstract class Signature
extends Object
    A Signature is the type metadata for the input or output of a Function.

      • assignableFrom

        public ValidationResult assignableFrom(Class... arguments)
        Tests whether the supplied types can be assigned to this Signature.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Class or Tuple of classes to test.
        Returns:
        ValidationResult containing the an isValid flag and errors messages.

      • assignableTo

        public ValidationResult assignableTo(Class... arguments)
        Tests whether this Signature can be assigned to the supplied types.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Class or Tuple of classes to test with.
        Returns:
        ValidationResult containing the an isValid flag and errors messages.

      • assignable

        public abstract ValidationResult assignable(boolean to,
                                            Class<?>... arguments)
        Tests whether this Signature is compatible with the types supplied.
        Parameters:
        to - If the test should be performed as an assignableTo.
        arguments - Class or Tuple of classes to test.
        Returns:
        ValidationResult containing the an isValid flag and errors messages.

        Get the input signature of a BiFunction.
        Type Parameters:
        F - the type of the BiFunction
        I - the first input type of the BiFunction

      • createSignatureFromTypeVariable

        protected static Signature createSignatureFromTypeVariable(Object input,
                                                           Class functionClass,
                                                           int typeVariableIndex)
        Create a Signature for the type variable at the given index.
        Parameters:
        input - Function to create signature for.
        functionClass - The input class
        typeVariableIndex - 0 for I or 1 for O.
        Returns:
        Signature of the type variable.

      • createSignature

        protected static Signature createSignature(Object input,
                                           Type type)
        Create a Signature for the supplied Type. This could be a singleton or tuple.
        Parameters:
        input - the input function
        type - Type to create a signature for.
        Returns:
        Signature of supplied type.
